channel.title: still experimenting on Gijutsu
channel.description: Recent content in still experimenting on Gijutsu

item.title: The Ninth Post Image Test
item.description: So in this post, I am going to try and add an image. I know this sounds silly but I need to understand what I am doing here. This isn’t as straightforward as Wordpress you know. Let’s see how it looks.

item.title: My Sixth Post
item.description: I guess I still don’t understand Git really well.

item.title: The fourth post
item.description: So this is the fourth post on the site and I am still learning new stuff. Wordpress was easier for sure but this is more efficient in the long run, I guess.
